description:
google-api-go-client: add -discoveryjson flag to generator.

Allow to generate API bindings from a local JSON discovery file.

messages.text:
Hello bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/google-api-go-client
Thanks, and sorry for the slow review, but somebody else already submitted a similar patch for this.  Let me know if it works for you.

mouse error
